translation.en: You know, we're told to eat healthy,
translation.zh: 当今社会大肆宣扬健康饮食

translation.en: to sort of shop the perimeters of the grocery stores,
translation.zh: 要我们在杂货店购买天然食品

translation.en: but I think what a lot of people don't realize
translation.zh: 但我认为很多人没有意识到

translation.en: is… this also may be the riskiest areas.
translation.zh: 这可能也是最危险的地方

translation.en: You know, when I look around,
translation.zh: 我环顾四周

translation.en: I probably see 10, 15 different items.
translation.zh: 大概能看见十到15种我打过官司的食品

translation.en: The product's been contaminated, or I sued companies on behalf of victims.
translation.zh: 有些是指控产品受污染有些是代表受害者控告相关企业

translation.en: [chuckles] I've litigated plenty of cases of romaine lettuce.
translation.zh: 我打过很多场罗马生菜的官司

translation.en: Cut fruit, you know, countless outbreaks.
translation.zh: 切块水果也爆发过无数次疫情

translation.en: Cut cantaloupe.
translation.zh: 切块哈密瓜

translation.en: Strawberries.
translation.zh: 草莓

translation.en: Caramel apples.
translation.zh: 焦糖苹果

translation.en: Tomatoes. Onions. Cookie dough.
translation.zh: 番茄、洋葱、曲奇面团

translation.en: The Similac infant formula.
translation.zh: 雅培婴儿配方奶粉

translation.en: Lucky Charms.
translation.zh: 幸运符早餐麦片

translation.en: Chicken, you know, all these products are likely contaminated.
translation.zh: 以及鸡肉所有这些产品都很可能受到污染

translation.en: It starts to feel, though, like nothing is safe, and you can't eat. Right?
translation.zh: 这让人开始担忧食品安全感觉什么都不能吃了 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, you know, the industry, they send us these mixed messages.
translation.zh: 对 整个食品行业传递出来的信息是前后矛盾的

translation.en: They want us to buy their product,
translation.zh: 他们既希望我们购买其商品

translation.en: but they ultimately don't want to be responsible… for what they produce.
translation.zh: 但到头来又不想为产品负责

translation.en: Until I show up.
translation.zh: 直到我的出现

translation.en: We have by far the safest food supply in the entire world.
translation.zh: 目前为止 我们的食品供应是全世界最安全的

translation.en: [woman 1] The safest food supply in the world.
translation.zh: 世界上最安全的食品供应

translation.en: Let's remember one thing, we have the safest food supply
translation.zh: 请不要忘了 我们美国拥有

translation.en: in the world right here in the US.
translation.zh: 全世界最安全的食品供应

translation.en: [reporter 1] The FDA is investigating a hepatitis A outbreak,
translation.zh: 食品药物管理局正针对A型肝炎疫情展开调查

translation.en: possibly linked to organic fresh strawberries.
translation.zh: 其致病源或与新鲜有机草莓相关

translation.en: A multistate salmonella outbreak.
translation.zh: 多州爆发沙门氏菌疫情

translation.en: Health experts believe it is linked to some Jif peanut butter products.
translation.zh: 卫生专家认为该疫情或与JIF牌的某些花生酱有关

translation.en: [reporter 2] The recalls come after at least two infant deaths
translation.zh: 在造成至少两名婴儿丧生数人染病之后

translation.en: and several illnesses were potentially tied to formula.
translation.zh: 潜在受污染的配方奶粉被召回

translation.en: [reporter 3] A variety of brands of raw cake mix have infected 16 people,
translation.zh: 多个品牌的生蛋糕预拌粉已导致16人染病

translation.en: one of which developed a type of kidney failure.
translation.zh: 其中一人发展至肾衰竭

translation.en: [woman 2] We talk about our food supply being the safest in the world,
translation.zh: 我们强调本国拥有全世界最安全的食品供应

translation.en: and I believe it is.
translation.zh: 我相信这是事实

translation.en: [reporter 4] People reported getting sick, being hospitalized for liver dysfunction,
translation.zh: 有人报告生病、因肝功能失常住院

translation.en: and even having their gallbladders removed in some cases.
translation.zh: 甚至在有些病例中患者被切除了胆囊

translation.en: [reporter 5] One in four pieces of raw chicken is contaminated with salmonella.
translation.zh: 每四块生鸡肉中就有一块被沙门氏菌感染

translation.en: [reporter 6] The CDC announced another E. coli outbreak is impacting romaine lettuce.
translation.zh: 疾控中心再次宣布大肠杆菌疫情爆发大批罗马生菜受感染

translation.en: We have the safest food supply in the world.
translation.zh: 我们拥有全世界最安全的食品供应

translation.en: [reporter 7] Melons from a Colorado farm
translation.zh: 来自科罗拉多州一家农场的哈密瓜

translation.en: are contaminated with what is called "listeria."
translation.zh: 被李斯特菌污染

translation.en: [reporter 8] Every four minutes, someone is rushed to the hospital
translation.zh: 每四分钟就有人因食物中毒

translation.en: because the food they ate made them sick.
translation.zh: 而被送医救治

translation.en: We must continue to have the safest food supply in the world.
translation.zh: 我们必须继续保持世界第一的食品安全指数

translation.en: Safest food in the world.
translation.zh: 全世界最安全的食品

translation.en: [man 1] Safest food supply in the world.
translation.zh: 世界上最安全的食品供应

translation.en: Safest food supply.
translation.zh: 最安全的食品供应

translation.en: [woman 3] Safest food supply in the world.
translation.zh: 全世界最安全的食品供应

translation.en: [man 2] We have the best, most efficient, safest food supply in the entire world.
translation.zh: 我们拥有全世界最优质、高效、安全的食品供应

translation.en: By golly, we need to keep it that way.
translation.zh: 天啊 我们得继续保持

translation.en: [announcer] Now, live at 11 o'clock.
translation.zh: 现在 开始11点的现场直播

translation.en: The warning tonight from health officials here in the Northwest.
translation.zh: 西北地区的卫生官员今晚发出警告

translation.en: They say you should be on the lookout for a life-threatening illness
translation.zh: 请民众注意本地区近日突发的

translation.en: that's cropping up in our area.
translation.zh: 一种致命疾病

translation.en: Forty-five people are…
translation.zh: 已有45人…

translation.en: [Bill] I actually remember this like it was yesterday.
translation.zh: 当时的情景 至今还历历在目

translation.en: There was an E. coli outbreak in the state of Washington
translation.zh: 在华盛顿州爆发了大肠杆菌疫情

translation.en: linked to something unknown.
translation.zh: 致病源不明

translation.en: [man] The whole problem started
translation.zh: 整件事的开端

translation.en: when a pediatric infectious-disease specialist called me and said,
translation.zh: 是一名儿科传染病专家打电话告诉我 （小林约翰医学士前华盛顿州流行病学家）

translation.en: "I've got 11 people who I've seen
translation.zh: “我这里30小时之内接诊了11名

translation.en: in about 30 hours with E. coli O157."
translation.zh: 感染O157型大肠杆菌的病人

translation.en: I've never seen anything like this before.
translation.zh: 这是我前所未见的情况”

translation.en: And that was a big red light for me
translation.zh: 这在我看来是一个危险的信号

translation.en: that something bad was going on.
translation.zh: 有某件不好的事情正在发生

translation.en: [reporter 1] Seven new cases of E. coli poisoning were confirmed…
translation.zh: 今早新增七例大肠杆菌食物中毒确诊病例…

translation.en: [reporter 2] …E. coli patients remain hospitalized.
translation.zh: …大肠杆菌感染者仍在住院治疗

translation.en: [reporter 3] There are 21 kids in Western Washington hospitals.
translation.zh: 西华盛顿医院目前收治了21名儿童

translation.en: Some experts say it's all about to get worse.
translation.zh: 一些专家称事态将持续恶化

translation.en: [John] We had no idea that it would be
translation.zh: 我们没想到 这会成为美国最大规模的一次食源性疾病爆发

translation.en: the largest foodborne outbreak in the United States.
translation.zh: 这会成为美国最大规模的一次食源性疾病爆发

translation.en: [man] I had just transferred from active duty.
translation.zh: 我当时刚被调离现役岗位

translation.en: I was a nuclear engineer on a submarine in the Navy.
translation.zh: 我之前在海军的一艘潜水艇上担任核能工程师

translation.en: I had a wife.
translation.zh: 我有妻子

translation.en: I had a nine-year-old son and a 16-month-old son at the time.
translation.zh: 有两个儿子 老大九岁 老二才16个月

translation.en: There had already been some news-- Some rumblings about an E. coli outbreak.
translation.zh: 当时已经有新闻…有迹象显示爆发了大肠杆菌疫情 （达林戴维勒莱利戴维勒的父亲）

translation.en: But it didn't mean anything to me. I never heard of E. coli.
translation.zh: 但我没当回事我从来没听说过大肠杆菌这东西

translation.en: "What's the worst that could happen?"
translation.zh: 最坏又能怎样呢？

translation.en: E. coli poisoning is a fairly new illness.
translation.zh: 大肠杆菌食物中毒是一种新型疾病

translation.en: Not much is known about why the bacteria causes some people to get so sick.
translation.zh: 这种细菌为何会令有些人出现重症我们对此知之甚少

translation.en: Mr. Kobayashi, can you tell us, uh, the concern seems to be with secondary…
translation.zh: 小林先生 请您说明一下目前的担忧似乎在于间接…

translation.en: [John] A big part of the outbreak was explaining what E. coli O157 was.
translation.zh: 疫情爆发时 大部分报道都着重于对O157型大肠杆菌的介绍

translation.en: I felt like I was, uh, Tony Fauci for a couple of weeks. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那几周里我感觉自己就像是安东尼福奇

translation.en: The average incubation period for most, uh, people is three to four days.
translation.zh: 大多数人的平均潜伏期是三到四天

translation.en: The problem is that it can take up to nine days before a person becomes ill.
translation.zh: 问题在于 有些人可能会在长达九天后才开始发病

translation.en: The mainstay of disease prevention, uh, for this type of illness
translation.zh: 预防这种疾病的主要方式

translation.en: is thorough washing of hands, uh, either when…
translation.zh: 就是仔细洗手…

translation.en: E. coli is a general category of bacteria,
translation.zh: 大肠杆菌是一类细菌的统称

translation.en: and they're natural inhabitants of everybody's intestines.
translation.zh: 它们是人类肠道中的常居菌

translation.en: There are many, many different kinds of E. coli.
translation.zh: 大肠杆菌有许多不同的种类

translation.en: Most don't do any harm at all.
translation.zh: 大部分都不致病

translation.en: But there are certain ones, like E. coli O157,
translation.zh: 但某些亚型 比如O157型大肠杆菌

translation.en: that can make you real sick.
translation.zh: 能导致严重疾病

translation.en: Within a couple of days,
translation.zh: 经过几天的调查研究

translation.en: it became clear that it was linked to Jack in the Box undercooked hamburgers.
translation.zh: 明确了该疫情… （比尔马勒食品安全律师） …与“盒子里的杰克”快餐连锁店的半熟汉堡有关

translation.en: More than 150 people have become ill after eating tainted hamburger meat
translation.zh: 在爱达荷和华盛顿州已有超过150人在食用了

translation.en: at Jack in the Box restaurants in Idaho and Washington State.
translation.zh: 受污染的“盒子里的杰克”汉堡肉后生病

translation.en: One child has died.
translation.zh: 一名儿童死亡

translation.en: So one of the big problems with E. coli O157
translation.zh: O157型大肠杆菌最致命的一点就是…

translation.en: is they produce what's called a Shiga toxin.
translation.zh: （兰斯普莱斯博士环境健康微生物学家） …它们会分泌志贺毒素

translation.en: They get into the gut and then start pumping out this toxin,
translation.zh: 一旦进入肠道它们就开始释放这种毒素

translation.en: and that toxin gets into the blood, and that will kill blood cells,
translation.zh: 毒素进入血液 杀死血细胞

translation.en: and then those lysed blood cells end up causing organ failure,
translation.zh: 那些被溶解的细胞最终会导致器官衰竭

translation.en: the kidneys to shut down.
translation.zh: 出现肾衰竭

translation.en: And that's how kids die.
translation.zh: 那正是患病儿童的死因

translation.en: There are now more than 312 cases in our state alone.
translation.zh: 到目前为止光本州境内就有超过312例确诊

translation.en: And today there was another death.
translation.zh: 今天又新增一名患者死亡

translation.en: So when the Jack in the Box case hit,
translation.zh: 接手盒子里的杰克这个案子时

translation.en: I was my fourth year out of law school.
translation.zh: 是我从法学院毕业的第四年

translation.en: I was 34 years old.
translation.zh: 我那时34岁

translation.en: I got a phone call from a former client of mine
translation.zh: 之前的一个客户给我来电话说

translation.en: who had a friend whose daughter, Brianne Kiner, was in the hospital.
translation.zh: 他有一个朋友的女儿布莉安凯纳正在住院治疗

translation.en: They asked me to go meet with them.
translation.zh: 他们想请我过去见见那家人

translation.en: She'd been hospitalized for, you know, four and a half, five months by then.
translation.zh: 那孩子当时已经住院四个半月、差不多五个月了

translation.en: There's so many mechanical things going on
translation.zh: 病房里有好多器械在运转

translation.en: and wires going into her and tubes going into her.
translation.zh: 她的身上插着各种管子和导线

translation.en: And I walked out of the room. I was crying.
translation.zh: 我是流着泪走出那个房间的

translation.en: Because it was just really difficult, you know?
translation.zh: 那个画面真的令人不忍卒睹

translation.en: It's difficult even today to think about, you know, Brianne in that situation.
translation.zh: 哪怕到了今天一想到布莉安的样子我都会心痛

translation.en: You know, she was… she was so vulnerable.
translation.zh: 她是那么地脆弱无助

translation.en: And she just ate a freakin' hamburger.
translation.zh: 而她只不过是吃了一个汉堡而已

translation.en: The board of directors of Jack in the Box is ordering a full investigation
translation.zh: “盒子里的杰克”公司董事会要求针对这起致命的错误

translation.en: into the deadly mistake.
translation.zh: 展开全面调查

translation.en: The investigators and the health department,
translation.zh: 调查人员和卫生部门

translation.en: they were able to determine that my kid got sick from this other kid
translation.zh: 确认了我的孩子是在日托中心

translation.en: at the daycare center.
translation.zh: 被另一个孩子传染的

translation.en: [reporter] Children's Hospital is treating 18 children this evening,
translation.zh: 今晚 儿童医院要治疗18名儿童患者

translation.en: four of whom got E. coli
translation.zh: 其中四人感染的大肠杆菌

translation.en: not from hamburgers but from someone else,
translation.zh: 并非来自于汉堡 而是人际传播

translation.en: a secondary infection.
translation.zh: 间接感染

translation.en: [Darin] All of a sudden, there were two new doctors that came in.
translation.zh: 突然 有两个没见过的医生走进来

translation.en: They announced that they believed
translation.zh: 说他们认为

translation.en: he had developed what's called hemolytic uremic syndrome.
translation.zh: 他已经发展到了溶血性尿毒综合征

translation.en: Which essentially is,
translation.zh: 基本上意思就是

translation.en: when it gets so bad,
translation.zh: 当病情严重恶化时

translation.en: the E. coli basically was eating him away from the inside.
translation.zh: 大肠杆菌就像是在从内部逐渐蚕食他

translation.en: That it was one organ after another.
translation.zh: 器官会一个接一个地衰竭

translation.en: I remember saving newspaper clippings, thinking someday I'll be able to
translation.zh: （莱利你是个特别棒的孩子！） 我记得当时我收藏了各种剪报 期望有朝一日

translation.en: communicate with my son and tell him how…
translation.zh: 能够告诉我儿子

translation.en: how brave he was
translation.zh: 他是多么地勇敢

translation.en: and how proud I was of him.
translation.zh: 我有多么地为他骄傲

translation.en: [reporter] I'd like to introduce Vicki and Darin Detwiler,
translation.zh: 请容我介绍薇琪和达林戴维勒

translation.en: whose 16-month-old son remains in critical condition
translation.zh: 他们年仅16个月的儿子目前重病垂危正在塔科马市的

translation.en: at Tacoma's Mary Bridge Hospital.
translation.zh: 玛丽桥儿童医院接受治疗

translation.en: My question to you now is,
translation.zh: 我现在要问的是

translation.en: what are you prepared to do in regards to the tainted-meat problem?
translation.zh: 你们打算如何处理肉制品受污染的问题？

translation.en: First of all, we've got to make it clear to people who are providing fast food
translation.zh: 首先 我们必须向快餐行业者申明

translation.en: that they've got to do everything they can to comply with our cooking regulations…
translation.zh: 他们必须全力遵守我们的食品烹饪规范…

translation.en: [John] The regulation in the United States
translation.zh: 美国的食品操作规范

translation.en: was that hamburger should be cooked to at least 140 degrees.
translation.zh: 要求汉堡肉必须被加热至60摄氏度或以上

translation.en: In Washington State,
translation.zh: 而在华盛顿州

translation.en: we had changed that law to 155 degrees because we noticed
translation.zh: 这一温度要求已被提高至68摄氏度 因为我们发现

translation.en: that many of the people with O157 had eaten poorly cooked hamburger.
translation.zh: 很多感染O157型大肠杆菌的患者都曾食用欠火候的汉堡肉

translation.en: [reporter] There's been lots of attention on this story,
translation.zh: 约翰 本次事件已引起诸多关注

translation.en: but I think there is still some confusion.
translation.zh: 但我认为人们仍然有很多疑惑

translation.en: Was it undercooking or contaminated beef that caused the problem?
translation.zh: 导致人生病的究竟是牛肉被污染还是烹饪未达标？

translation.en: Barry, I think that some of that confusion has been probably from industry statements
translation.zh: 巴瑞 我想这一疑问某种程度上是源自于食品行业的声明

translation.en: trying to avoid some of the blame for this. The answer is both.
translation.zh: 相关业者试图逃避一部分罪责答案是二者皆有

translation.en: The company was not following the procedure
translation.zh: 那家公司没有遵守… （玛丽翁奈索《安全食品》作者）

translation.en: that was required by the state of Washington,
translation.zh: …华盛顿州明令要求的食品操作流程

translation.en: which the company said they didn't know anything about.
translation.zh: 他们声称并不知道有那么一个规范

translation.en: [reporter] Do you believe, in retrospect,
translation.zh: 现在回想起来 你认为

translation.en: that Jack in the Box chose not to pay attention to certain things, like the law?
translation.zh: 盒子里的杰克是否刻意忽视了某些东西 比如相关法律？

translation.en: No, I don't believe that at all.
translation.zh: 不 我完全不这么认为

translation.en: We would never choose not to pay attention to the law.
translation.zh: 我们永远不会刻意忽视法律规定

translation.en: Why… why would a company choose not to pay attention to the law?
translation.zh: 怎么会有公司刻意去做这种事？

translation.en: [Bill] During discovery, they dumped on me about a million pages of documents.
translation.zh: 在调查期间 他们扔给我一大堆文件

translation.en: I am pretty confident that they thought that I wouldn't go through them,
translation.zh: 他们一定以为我不会仔细审查

translation.en: but we started finding things that were really interesting.
translation.zh: 但我们发现了一些很有意思的东西

translation.en: An employee of Jack in the Box
translation.zh: 盒子里的杰克曾有一名员工

translation.en: sent a letter in the suggestion box to corporate headquarters saying,
translation.zh: 写了一封信给公司总部并将其投入了建议箱 信上说

translation.en: "Hey, we're undercooking our hamburgers, and we're having customer complaints."
translation.zh: “嘿 我们的汉堡未充分烹熟正因此受到顾客投诉”

translation.en: And then you could see the real paper trail.
translation.zh: 然后我们还看到了相关的书面文件

translation.en: Not only did they receive the new regulations
translation.zh: 他们不仅收到了华盛顿州

translation.en: from the state of Washington for increased cook times
translation.zh: 有关增加烹饪时长的新规定

translation.en: but that they actually thought about it
translation.zh: 还切实思考过这个问题

translation.en: and made the decision to essentially ignore it.
translation.zh: 然后决定选择无视它

translation.en: Once I had that,
translation.zh: 一拿到那个证据

translation.en: I called up the lawyer for Jack in the Box and said, you know, "You're done."
translation.zh: 我就给盒子里的杰克的律师致电说：“你完蛋了”

translation.en: Jack in the Box now admits it misplaced a Washington State advisory
translation.zh: 盒子里的杰克如今承认他们误将华盛顿州关于所有汉堡肉

translation.en: directing that all hamburgers must be cooked at 155 degrees.
translation.zh: 必须加热至68摄氏度的公告束之高阁了

translation.en: Jack in the Box says it found the advisory when…
translation.zh: 盒子里的杰克称他们发现该公告时…

translation.en: [interviewer] Specific to Jack in the Box, how did the burgers get contaminated?
translation.zh: 在盒子里的杰克一案中那些汉堡究竟是怎么被污染的？

translation.en: [hesitates] So, we don't know exactly
translation.zh: 我们并不能确定

translation.en: how the Jack in the Box hamburger got contaminated,
translation.zh: 盒子里的杰克那些汉堡是如何受到了污染

translation.en: but, you know, generally, we know how it happens.
translation.zh: 但我们大致知道食品污染是如何发生的

translation.en: It's usually in the slaughter facility.
translation.zh: 通常是在屠宰场

translation.en: It's, uh, nicking of a gut of a cow during slaughter.
translation.zh: 譬如在切割牛肠时沾染了细菌

translation.en: But the whole meat industry was premised on the fact that the slaughterhouses
translation.zh: 但整个肉类行业都默认了一个现实那就是屠宰场

translation.en: and the beef packers could essentially do whatever they wanted to do.
translation.zh: 和牛肉包装工们在生产操作过程中基本都是按自己习惯来的

translation.en: And it was up to consumers
translation.zh: 而肉制品中的大肠杆菌能否被烹煮杀灭…

translation.en: to cook the E. coli out of the product.
translation.zh: …就要取决于消费者的饮食习惯了

translation.en: If you buy a piece of steak, that's a piece of meat from one animal.
translation.zh: 若你买的是一块牛排它是从单个动物身上割下的一块肉

translation.en: If there is E. coli, it's on the outside. It's not in the middle.
translation.zh: 如果存在大肠杆菌那也是在外部 而非内里

translation.en: So searing the steak would help kill that.
translation.zh: 所以在炙烤的过程中细菌就可能被杀灭

translation.en: The problem is that when you buy ground beef,
translation.zh: 问题就在于 若你买的是绞烂的肉碎

translation.en: you now take the outsides, and they're part of the insides.
translation.zh: 原本附着于表面的大肠杆菌就搅入了肉馅之中

translation.en: Not only are you bringing all the animals together and slaughtering them in the same facility,
translation.zh: 你不光在同一家屠宰场宰杀不计其数的牲口

translation.en: now you're taking chunks of multiple animals, and you're grinding them up into one big mess.
translation.zh: 还把不同动物的肉块混在一起搅成肉泥

translation.en: [Marion] Hamburger, sometimes, is the result of mixing meat
translation.zh: 有时候一块汉堡肉就是由

translation.en: from as many as 400 animals.
translation.zh: 多达400头牲畜的肉混合而成的

translation.en: [chuckling] Kind of awful to think about.
translation.zh: 可想而知有多糟糕了

translation.en: If one of those animals has this toxic form of E. coli,
translation.zh: 一旦其中一头牲畜的肉里携带了致病性的大肠杆菌

translation.en: you're in trouble.
translation.zh: 那麻烦就来了

translation.en: [Bill] In the aftermath of Jack in the Box,
translation.zh: 在盒子里的杰克事件之后

translation.en: you know, people from USDA met with victims,
translation.zh: 美国农业部派了代表面见受害者

translation.en: and, you know, the Clinton Administration, to their credit,
translation.zh: 值得赞许的是 克林顿政府

translation.en: brought in people who were pretty activist.
translation.zh: 把一些积极的活动家召入了麾下

translation.en: Mike?
translation.zh: 麦克？

translation.en: [Bill] You know, Mike Taylor being one.
translation.zh: 其中就包括麦克泰勒

translation.en: We intend to reduce the risk of foodborne illness
translation.zh: 我们旨在最大程度地降低与摄入肉禽类产品相关的

translation.en: associated with the consumption of meat and poultry products
translation.zh: 我们旨在最大程度地降低与摄入肉禽类产品相关的 食源性疾病爆发的风险

translation.en: to the maximum extent possible.
translation.zh: 食源性疾病爆发的风险

translation.en: [assistant] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Mike] The official policy of the USDA was
translation.zh: 美国农业部当时的官方政策是

translation.en: that this is not the responsibility of the regulatory system or the industry.
translation.zh: 这并非监管系统或行业自身的责任… （麦克泰勒 前美国农业部食品安全检验局官员）

translation.en: Consumers are expected to cook these products and make them safe themselves.
translation.zh: …消费者需要自己烹煮这些产品以确保安全食用

translation.en: The bottom line is that raw meat contains bacteria.
translation.zh: 最重要的事实就是生肉中含有细菌

translation.en: And proper cooking kills bacteria.
translation.zh: 而适当的烹饪会杀死细菌

translation.en: [Mike] To mothers that lost children,
translation.zh: 对痛失爱子的母亲来说

translation.en: to people whose families had been harmed by this outbreak,
translation.zh: 对这次疫情中的受害者亲属来说

translation.en: that was, uh, a shocking and highly unacceptable revelation.
translation.zh: 这是令人震惊和难以接受的说辞

translation.en: We simply had to take action immediately to try to change the dynamic.
translation.zh: 我们必须立即采取行动努力改变这样的作风

translation.en: And so I did make the decision that we would declare O157:H7 to be an adulterant,
translation.zh: 所以我决定宣布将O157：H7型大肠杆菌列为掺假物

translation.en: and raw ground beef in the marketplace would be deemed illegal,
translation.zh: 并明令禁止在市场出售被其污染的生搅牛肉

translation.en: and USDA could take action to remove it quickly from the market.
translation.zh: 美国农业部有权采取行动将受污染的肉下架

translation.en: That was a big game changer.
translation.zh: 那是一项重大改变

translation.en: It meant that it can't be in the meat.
translation.zh: 意味着肉制品里不能含有这个亚型的大肠杆菌

translation.zh: 所以这很大程度上证明了这些整改措施的有效性

translation.zh: 就会被运往农场

translation.en: They come here a day old.
translation.zh: 它们刚出生一天就被送到这里

translation.en: Day they hatch, we get them here, put them in the chicken house.
translation.zh: 孵化当日我们就会把小鸡送来 放进鸡舍

translation.en: They stay here about 45 days.
translation.zh: 它们会在这里待上大约45天

translation.en: These birds here are about 14 days, two weeks old.
translation.zh: 这些小鸡已经在这儿住了14天 两周大了

translation.en: So we monitor for specific types of salmonella,
translation.zh: 我们会检测特定类型的沙门氏菌

translation.en: and we use this sampling technique called boot swabs, or bootie swabs,
translation.zh: 我们采用的取样技术叫做“鞋拭子” 或者“靴拭子”

translation.en: where you take a sock that's doused in skim milk, put it over your boot,
translation.zh: 把浸泡过脱脂牛奶的鞋套套在靴子底部

translation.en: and walk through the chicken house trying to sample as many chicken's droppings
translation.zh: 在鸡舍里穿行 尽可能多地接触粪便

translation.en: as you can possibly pick up with those boots.
translation.zh: 以获取尽可能多的样品

translation.en: And we figure over 100 chickens contribute to the bootie sample.
translation.zh: 一份“靴拭子”样本上大约有100只鸡的粪便

translation.en: We send that to the lab and look for salmonella.
translation.zh: 我们把它送到实验室 检测沙门氏菌

translation.en: [Bruce in scene] This is boneless, skinless breast.
translation.zh: 这是去骨去皮的鸡胸肉

translation.en: It comes down the line after it's been taken off the, uh, bone.
translation.zh: 肉被从骨头上剔下来后进入流水线

translation.en: It goes into this unit and is washed.
translation.zh: 然后被投入这个装置 进行清洗

translation.en: There's some peracetic acid, helps us keep it clean
translation.zh: 我们适当地使用了一些过氧乙酸它能帮助我们

translation.en: from the process that we just did all the way to the package.
translation.zh: 在这个步骤和后续流程中维持鸡肉的卫生 直到完成包装

translation.en: We believe that if a bird came in with a little bit of salmonella,
translation.zh: 我们相信即便有某只鸡携带了少量沙门氏菌

translation.en: it'd be washed off and taken care of.
translation.zh: 也会在这个过程中被冲走和消灭

translation.en: One of the big broken pieces of the American food safety system
translation.zh: 美国食品安全体系最大的缺陷之一

translation.en: is that we don't monitor anything on the farm.
translation.zh: 就是缺乏对农场的监督

translation.en: Those are off-limits to regulators.
translation.zh: 那对监管机构来说是一个禁区

translation.en: [Lance] The problem lies in that a lot of salmonella is found at the farm level,
translation.zh: 问题就在于很多沙门氏菌正是在农场里

translation.en: at the hatchery level.
translation.zh: 或者孵化场里发现的

translation.en: And, you know, USDA's jurisdiction doesn't kick in
translation.zh: 而只有等到那些鸡真正进入屠宰场时

translation.en: until those chickens actually enter the slaughter plant.
translation.zh: 美国农业部才对其具有管辖权

translation.en: [assistant] A-mark.
translation.zh: A号摄影机开拍

translation.en: [interviewer] Let's just start off with, tell me what you do for work.
translation.zh: 作为开始 请介绍一下你从事的工作

translation.en: [inspector in distorted voice] I am a USDA consumer safety inspector,
translation.zh: 我是美国农业部的商品质检员

translation.en: and I inspect chickens.
translation.zh: 我负责检查鸡肉

translation.en: We run over 300,000 chickens a day.
translation.zh: 我们每天要检查超过30万只鸡

translation.en: We're looking at 175 birds a minute, and they're going by so fast.
translation.zh: 每分钟检查175只鸡那些鸡的移动速度相当快

translation.en: There's only one inspector at the very end of the line,
translation.zh: 每条作业线末尾只配有一名质检员

translation.en: and they do miss a lot sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候会有很多遗漏

translation.en: Some of the plants I've worked at,
translation.zh: 我去过的一些工厂

translation.en: I feel like the chicken's not safe to go out.
translation.zh: 我认为将那些地方的鸡投入市场并不安全

translation.en: I feel like consumers would really be shocked
translation.zh: 我觉得我要说的一些事

translation.en: at some of the stories that we could tell them.
translation.zh: 也许会让消费者们大为震惊

translation.en: I've seen… [sighs] …plant person throwing chickens in the chiller
translation.zh: 我见过有工人将沾有排泄物的鸡

translation.en: and would have fecal matter in them.
translation.zh: 扔进冷却机

translation.en: I've seen inspectors sleep on the line and product just going on by.
translation.zh: 我见过有质检员在作业线边上睡觉任由产品从面前经过

translation.en: And you'll see employees, they've been to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 还有一些员工去上厕所以后

translation.en: They're not washing their hands.
translation.zh: 没有洗手就回来了

translation.en: I've seen… [sighs] …people drop their knives, not attempt to pick them up and wash it,
translation.zh: 我见过有人弄掉了刀具没有捡起来拿去洗

translation.en: just go right back to using it.
translation.zh: 就直接继续使用

translation.en: They got a quota they gotta meet.
translation.zh: 他们都有必须完成的工作量

translation.en: And, you know, I feel like they're there to make a profit
translation.zh: 我感觉他们就是去赚钱的

translation.en: and get the chickens through.
translation.zh: 就是在例行公事

translation.en: They don't care what shape they're in.
translation.zh: 他们根本不在乎从那里出去的鸡质量如何

translation.en: The USDA inspection regime is really… goes back to the early 1900s
translation.zh: 美国农业部的检查制度非常…它可以回溯至20世纪初

translation.en: and, you know, Upton Sinclair's book The Jungle.
translation.zh: 厄普顿辛克莱的小说《屠场》

translation.en: [narrator] It was not a pleasant novel.
translation.zh: 这不是一本轻松欢快的小说

translation.en: It told of conditions of filth and carelessness in the handling of meat,
translation.zh: 它揭露了肉类加工业的肮脏环境和业者满不在乎的态度

translation.en: and those who read it became concerned and aroused.
translation.zh: 这激发了读者的担忧和愤怒

translation.en: It's an outrage.
translation.zh: 简直令人发指

translation.en: [Mike] Meat and poultry inspection laws are designed to deal with the problem
translation.zh: 泰迪罗斯福在1906年赴芝加哥的肉类包装厂视察

translation.en: that Teddy Roosevelt addressed in 1906 in meatpacking plants in Chicago,
translation.zh: 亲眼目睹了生病的动物被送进工厂受污染的肉被投入食品系统

translation.en: which is diseased animals coming into facilities,
translation.zh: 于是肉禽类行业的监管法律得以制定

translation.en: spoiled meat being put into the food system.
translation.zh: 意图整顿糟糕的现状

translation.en: [Bill] Frankly, when they built that inspection regime,
translation.zh: 坦白说 当初建立检查制度的时候

translation.en: we didn't even understand viruses and bacteria.
translation.zh: 我们根本不了解病毒和细菌

translation.en: [man] Every bird must be individually inspected.
translation.zh: 每只禽鸟都必须受到单独检查

translation.en: It must prove to be wholesome, or else it is condemned.
translation.zh: 若无法证明健康 那它就是染病的

translation.en: [Marion] What they're expected to do has nothing to do with bacteria.
translation.zh: 那些监管举措与细菌毫无关系

translation.en: You can't see bacteria.
translation.zh: 人无法看到细菌

translation.en: They're not visible to the naked eye.
translation.zh: 那是肉眼看不见的东西

translation.en: [Mike] You have hundreds, if not thousands,
translation.zh: 在屠宰生产线上

translation.en: of poultry inspectors sitting on slaughter lines,
translation.zh: 有成百上千名禽类监察员站岗

translation.en: watching birds go by, to meet the statutory mandate
translation.zh: 盯着眼前摇晃而过的禽肉 因为按照法律规定

translation.en: to have a US government inspector look at every chicken that goes through a facility
translation.zh: 工厂生产的每一只鸡都必须经过美国政府监察员的视察

translation.en: with no meaningful benefit for food safety.
translation.zh: 然而这项规定对食品安全毫无意义

translation.en: It's a waste of hundreds of millions of dollars.
translation.zh: 只是在白白浪费数以亿计的美金

translation.en: I disagree with that assessment for a number of reasons.
translation.zh: 我不认同这一评价 原因不止一个

translation.en: They do look at the product.
translation.zh: 他们确实会查看产品

translation.en: That's what the law requires under current statutes.
translation.zh: 这是目前的法律规定

translation.en: They look at the records that companies keep
translation.zh: 他们会查看各个公司的记录

translation.en: to ensure that they're doing what they're supposed to do,
translation.zh: 以确保其遵守了行业规范

translation.en: and they sample and test product.
translation.zh: 他们还会对产品进行取样和测试

translation.en: [inspector in distorted voice] We run millions of birds a month.
translation.zh: 我们每个月要经手几百万只家禽

translation.en: We test five salmonella samples a month of a whole bird.
translation.zh: 但我们工厂每月只会检测五只整鸡

translation.en: And we do five samples of parts at our plant.
translation.zh: 和五份切块产品

translation.en: That's all the USDA does.
translation.zh: 这就是美国农业部的工作

translation.en: And just because it says that "USDA inspected" on there,
translation.zh: 虽然上面写着“美国农业部检查认证”

translation.en: it don't mean nothing because it's gotta be on their label.
translation.zh: 但那其实毫无意义因为反正都要加在商标上的

translation.en: I wouldn't want to eat nothing coming from some of the plants myself.
translation.zh: 我自己都不愿意吃那间工厂生产出来的东西

translation.en: When you bring raw poultry into your kitchen,
translation.zh: 你把生禽肉拿进厨房的同时

translation.en: you're taking a significant risk.
translation.zh: 就承担了巨大的风险

translation.en: The real problem is that even somebody as careful as me,
translation.zh: 真正的问题是哪怕像我这么小心谨慎的人

translation.en: I'm a microbiologist that studies these pathogens,
translation.zh: 我是研究这些病原体的微生物学家

translation.en: when I bring these packages into my house,
translation.zh: 一旦把这些包装好的禽肉带回家

translation.en: it's really hard not to contaminate things.
translation.zh: 就很难不污染到周边环境

translation.en: I'm gonna open that package,
translation.zh: 我一打开包装就会把塑料膜扔进垃圾桶

translation.en: and I'm immediately gonna put that plastic into the trash.
translation.zh: 我一打开包装就会把塑料膜扔进垃圾桶 （一次污染）

translation.en: I'm gonna use my foot.
translation.zh: 我会用脚打开桶盖

translation.en: Then I'm gonna take the chicken
translation.zh: 然后我把鸡肉拿出来

translation.en: and immediately put it into, you know, hot oil and start frying it.
translation.zh: 直接放到热油上煎 （二次污染）

translation.en: -[whimsical music plays] -[chicken sizzling]
translation.zh: （高温 - 低温）

translation.en: Then I'm gonna throw away the rest of the package,
translation.zh: 然后我把剩下的包装托盘扔掉

translation.en: but this time I touched the top of the trash can, right?
translation.zh: 但这次我的手接触了垃圾桶盖子 对吧？

translation.en: And then I go wash my hand, and I turn on the faucet.
translation.zh: （六次污染） 我洗手时打开水龙头水龙头被污染了

translation.en: I've just contaminated the faucet.
translation.zh: 我洗手时打开水龙头水龙头被污染了

translation.en: I pump the soap. I've just contaminated the soap.
translation.zh: 我按压取洗手液 洗手液被污染了

translation.en: I'm gonna wash my hands really well.
translation.zh: 我会认真仔细地洗手

translation.en: Then I'm gonna rinse my hands, and shut off the faucet.
translation.zh: 我把手上的泡沫冲洗干净关上水龙头

translation.en: I've just recontaminated my hand, and I'm gonna go make a salad.
translation.zh: 我的手被污染了但我接下来要去做沙拉

translation.en: As careful as I am, those bacteria get around.
translation.zh: 尽管我已经非常小心那些细菌还是传播开来了

translation.en: Once that salmonella is dry, it can stay on surfaces for months.
translation.zh: 物体表面干燥以后残留其上的沙门氏菌能存活数月之久

translation.en: It could still make someone sick when ingested.
translation.zh: 一旦入口 仍能致病

translation.en: You should know that when you bring raw poultry into your kitchen,
translation.zh: 你需要明白一点你把生禽肉带进厨房的那一刻

translation.en: you are introducing into your household a biohazard,
translation.zh: 同时也把潜在的生物危害带了进去

translation.en: and you should handle it accordingly.
translation.zh: 你应该谨慎处理

translation.en: [Lance] When you consume salmonella,
translation.zh: 一旦食入了沙门氏菌

translation.en: some of those strains also are resistant to multiple antibiotics,
translation.zh: 它的某些菌株对多种抗生素都具有抗药性

translation.en: and so the likelihood that a treatment is going to fail is much higher.
translation.zh: 这大大增加了抗生素治疗失败的可能性

translation.en: Those bacteria are going to continue to grow in your blood,
translation.zh: 那些细菌会持续在人的血液里繁殖

translation.en: and sadly, people die of these infections.
translation.zh: 遗憾的是 很多人会因感染而丧命

translation.en: [Mansour] So the way we test foods,
translation.zh: 我来介绍一下我们检测食品的方式

translation.en: I think the samples dropped off here for us to test were five samples
translation.zh: 有五份样品被送到了我们这里检验

translation.en: of… of chicken that were purchased from local grocery stores.
translation.zh: 都是从当地杂货店购买的鸡肉

translation.en: In about one hour, we get results,
translation.zh: 大约一小时后 我们会得出结果

translation.en: whether it has salmonella or not.
translation.zh: 看鸡肉是否携带沙门氏菌

translation.en: [interviewer] On our first day of production, we went to a food safety lab in Seattle.
translation.zh: 我们在开始摄制的第一天就去了西雅图的一家食品安全实验室

translation.en: We picked up five brands of raw chicken and tested them.
translation.zh: 我们采买了五个品牌的生鸡肉送去检测

translation.en: And we were told by the lab, "You're not gonna get positive results."
translation.zh: 实验室跟我们说这样是不会得出阳性结果的

translation.en: "It's too small of a sample."
translation.zh: 样品数量太少了

translation.en: We got one positive results, and it was Perdue.
translation.zh: 但结果有一份样品测出了阳性正是裴顿的产品

translation.en: -Can I just ask for your reaction to that? -[smacks lips]
translation.zh: 请问你对此有何回应？

translation.en: I would say a chicken is, uh, not even a fair thing to talk about.
translation.zh: 我认为光讨论一只鸡的检测结果未免有失公允

translation.en: Uh, so, I mean, again, we run hundreds of birds
translation.zh: 重申一遍 我们会检测数百只禽鸟

translation.en: in order to understand where we're at.
translation.zh: 来了解产品的情况

translation.en: And the other part is I would wonder
translation.zh: 还有一个问题是 我想请问检测出的沙门氏菌是哪种亚型？

translation.en: what the salmonella was in particular.
translation.zh: 还有一个问题是 我想请问检测出的沙门氏菌是哪种亚型？ -不过…-是肠炎沙门氏菌

translation.en: [interviewer] It was infantis.
translation.zh: -不过…-是肠炎沙门氏菌

translation.en: Yeah. Having said that, one chicken is not a fair… uh, fair discussion at all.
translation.zh: 对 话虽如此 光看一只鸡的检测结果来讨论问题 这样不公平

translation.en: [interviewer] What do you think would be a fair sample set?
translation.zh: 你认为如何取样才算公平？

translation.en: A hundred and fifty, uh, in a relatively short period of time.
translation.zh: 在相对短的时间里抽取150个样本

translation.en: [interviewer] So you're going to be testing 150 chicken parts
translation.zh: 请你们在五周内帮我们检测150份鸡肉样本

translation.en: for us over the course of five weeks
translation.zh: 它们来自全国各地

translation.en: from the top four major brands in this country.
translation.zh: 是美国最主流的四大鸡肉品牌的产品

translation.en: You're close to the end of testing all one hundred--
translation.zh: 你就快完成100份样品的测试…

translation.en: We're slightly-- We're about 60% of testing
translation.zh: 如果你的目标是检测完150份样品

translation.en: if you intend to bring in 150.
translation.zh: 我们已经完成了大约60%

translation.en: Great. If I buy chicken at the grocery store,
translation.zh: 好极了 如果我去杂货店买鸡肉

translation.en: should I assume it's safe for me?
translation.zh: 我应该假定那些肉是安全的吗？

translation.en: In this country, if you buy poultry, uh, from any grocery store,
translation.zh: 你在这个国家的任何一家杂货店买禽肉

translation.en: regardless of the brand of poultry that you buy,
translation.zh: 无论买的什么品牌

translation.en: your… your primary assumption should be that
translation.zh: 你首要的假设都应该是 肉里会含有沙门氏菌或弯曲杆菌这类病原体

translation.en: it contains pathogens such as salmonella and campylobacter.
translation.zh: 肉里会含有沙门氏菌或弯曲杆菌这类病原体

translation.en: The fact of the matter is salmonella in chicken is okay to be sold.
translation.zh: 事实是含有沙门氏菌的鸡肉是可以上架出售的

translation.en: It's not an adulterant.
translation.zh: 那不算掺假

translation.en: So it's fine to knowingly sell salmonella, campylobacter-tainted chicken.
translation.zh: 所以厂商可以在明知鸡肉感染了沙门氏菌或弯曲杆菌的情况下出售

translation.en: There was a famous case where the government and industry simply said
translation.zh: 在一桩很有名的案件里政府和行业干脆直截了当地说

translation.en: that it was the housewife's job to protect the family.
translation.zh: 保护家人的健康是主妇的职责

translation.en: [Brian] What it boils down to
translation.zh: （《厨房安全操作指南》） 归根结底 原因就在于

translation.en: is the courts ruled that, you know, the salmonella can't be considered an adulterant
translation.zh: 法院裁定沙门氏菌不能算做掺假物

translation.en: because housewives know how to cook chicken.
translation.zh: 因为主妇们知道该如何烹饪鸡肉

translation.en: [narrator] Can she prepare those favorite dishes of Tim's just like his mother used to make?
translation.zh: 她能做出提姆最爱的菜肴媲美他妈妈的手艺吗？

translation.en: [Brian] And therefore, it doesn't pose a threat to human illness.
translation.zh: 所以它不会对人类的健康构成威胁

translation.en: [narrator] Remember, it pays to play safe in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 请记住在厨房进行安全操作的好处多多

translation.en: This terrible court case dealt a death blow
translation.zh: 这个糟糕的裁决终结了美国

translation.en: to… to regulation in the United States regarding salmonella.
translation.zh: 对沙门氏菌的监管进程

translation.en: Sadly, a true death blow to a lot of people since.
translation.zh: 遗憾的是 也无异于给很多无辜消费者宣判了死刑

translation.en: The USDA throws up its hand and says,
translation.zh: 美国农业部撒手不管了 说

translation.en: "Toxic salmonella are a normal part of raw chicken."
translation.zh: “生鸡肉里会携带致病的沙门氏菌 这很正常

translation.en: "You don't want toxic salmonella? Cook it."
translation.zh: 你不想感染沙门氏菌生病？那就把肉做熟”

translation.en: [Bill] That's what we're trying to change.
translation.zh: 这就是我们想要改变的现状

translation.en: The burden shouldn't be with consumers.
translation.zh: 这不是消费者应该背负的重担

translation.en: And that's why we filed a petition with the USDA.
translation.zh: 正因如此我们向美国农业部递交了请愿书

translation.en: Well, welcome. Let me just say it's so good to really be, uh, with… with all of you.
translation.zh: 欢迎大家很高兴能跟你们面对面地交流

translation.en: I… I just have such high regard for the work that you do and…
translation.zh: 我很钦佩各位做出的努力

translation.en: I know, Bill, you have petitions that you have moving forward,
translation.zh: 比尔 我知道你提交了请愿你向前迈进了一步

translation.en: and Sarah, you do, uh, as well.
translation.zh: 莎拉 你也一直坚持不懈

translation.en: And I'd love to have you just update me.
translation.zh: 我想请各位向我介绍一下最近的活动

translation.en: I made a really broad petition that would essentially encompass
translation.zh: 我写了一份内容广泛的请愿书基本囊括了所有能导致

translation.en: making all salmonellas that cause human disease an adulterant.
translation.zh: 人类生病的沙门氏菌亚种我恳请将它们列为掺假物

translation.en: Draw a line in the sand and say, you know, "Thou shalt not have a pathogen

translation.zh: 如果要即刻列出一份高风险食品的名单

translation.en: romaine lettuce would be near the top, if not at the top.
translation.zh: 罗马生菜就算不是高居榜首也会是前几名

translation.en: [interviewer] I'm curious if you eat romaine?
translation.zh: 我很好奇 你平时吃生菜吗？

translation.en: I don't.
translation.zh: 我不吃

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you eat romaine?
translation.zh: 你会吃生菜吗？

translation.en: [splutters] I do steer clear of romaine for the most part.
translation.zh: 我大多数时候都会避免食用罗马生菜

translation.en: I mean, I think about it every time I eat it.
translation.zh: 每次吃罗马生菜 我都会担忧

translation.en: I, you know… I've rolled the dice. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我就是拿健康在打赌

translation.en: [interviewer] Are there any foods that you both absolutely avoid?
translation.zh: 有什么食物是你们俩都不吃的吗？ （朱莉马勒比尔的妻子）

translation.en: Bagged-- We don't buy prepackaged bagged salads.
translation.zh: 袋装…我们不会买预先包装的袋装沙拉

translation.en: -Um… -[Julie] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: We kind of tend to shy away from romaine, especially from Yuma or Salinas.
translation.zh: 我们一般不会购买罗马生菜 尤其是产自尤马或者萨利纳斯的

translation.en: [interviewer] Has the LGMA response prevented leafy greens outbreaks in your opinion?
translation.zh: 你认为绿叶蔬菜营销协会的应对措施是否达到了防止疫情爆发的目的？

translation.en: LGMA has made a significant difference in this industry.
translation.zh: 协会为这个产业带来了重大的改变

translation.en: [interviewer] Are there any studies that document
translation.zh: 有没有相关研究记录了

translation.en: the improvement of safety after the implementation of LGMA?
translation.zh: 绿叶蔬菜营销协会给食品安全带来的改善？

translation.en: I don't know of any. [inhales]
translation.zh: 据我所知没有

translation.en: [interviewer] So you say that you feel confident that it's prevented certain outbreaks--
translation.zh: 你刚才很自信地表示协会防止了某些疫情的爆发…

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: [interviewer] I want to run through
translation.zh: 我想列举一下

translation.en: some things that have gone down the past five years.
translation.zh: 过去五年发生的一些事件

translation.en: So September 2017, eight people sick from spinach.
translation.zh: 2017年9月 八人因为食用菠菜而染病

translation.en: November 2017, 67 people sick from another unknown leafy green outbreak.
translation.zh: 2017年11月 另一起由未知绿叶蔬菜导致的疫情爆发 67人患病

translation.en: Then the following year in March, a big one, 248 people, five dead.
translation.zh: 然后来年3月一场大爆发导致248人染病 五人死亡

translation.en: April 2018, ten people.
translation.zh: 2018年4月 十人

translation.en: October 2018, three separate leafy green outbreaks, sickening 135 people.
translation.zh: 2018年10月 三起绿色蔬菜疫情共致135人染病

translation.en: November, same thing, 167 people sick.
translation.zh: 11月 又是同样的疫情 167人染病

translation.en: November 2019, two more outbreaks that same year.
translation.zh: 2019年11月 再度爆发两起疫情

translation.en: October 2020, 40 people.
This isn't a great track record, is it?
translation.zh: 这一连串记录并不赏心悦目 对吧？

translation.en: I think we have a lot to be proud of.
translation.zh: 我们有很多值得骄傲的成绩

translation.en: Certainly, every one of those is… is a tragic incident
translation.zh: 诚然 每次疫情爆发都是一场悲剧

translation.en: and the effect it had on those consumers.
translation.zh: 它给消费者带去了难以磨灭的影响

translation.en: But I am confident of the progress that we have made through the LGMA
translation.zh: 但我相信LGMA的努力业已取得了一定的成果

translation.en: and the difference we have made in the industry.
translation.zh: 并且改善了整个行业的环境

translation.en: [Christine] One thing that jumped out at me when reporting
translation.zh: 在我报道这些罗马生菜疫情时

translation.en: on these romaine lettuce outbreaks is how little the federal government
translation.zh: 有一件事引起了我的注意那就是联邦政府处理这一问题的力度

translation.en: was doing to address them.
translation.zh: 微乎其微

translation.en: For many years, we've given the responsibility to the businesses
translation.zh: 多年来 我们都将保障食品安全的责任

translation.en: and let them take responsibility, and that's not working.
translation.zh: 交给了商家而这并没有带来应有的效果

translation.en: [interviewer] I'm being asked to wrap up.
translation.zh: 我被告知访谈该进入收尾环节了

translation.en: What do you want the viewers to know about this issue?
translation.zh: 关于这个问题二位有什么想对观众说的吗？

translation.en: Well, I would like your viewers to know
translation.zh: 我希望本片的观众明确一件事

translation.en: that the US has among the safest food systems in the world.
translation.zh: 那就是美国拥有全世界首屈一指的食品安全系统

translation.en: But we plan to work together to create an even safer, more digital,
translation.zh: 我们致力于共同打造一个更加安全、更为数据化

translation.en: transparent, and sustainable food system that's going to be good for consumers.
translation.zh: 信息透明、可持续的食品系统它不但会造福所有消费者

translation.en: It'll be good for producers, and it will be good for the planet.
translation.zh: 也将有益于生产者和整个地球

translation.en: I can't even tell you how many times
translation.zh: 这句话我已经听过无数次了

translation.en: I have heard policymakers, executives, leaders say the phrase,
translation.zh: 政策制定者、行政人员、领导人都爱说这句套话

translation.en: "America has the safest food system in the world."
translation.zh: “美国拥有全世界最安全的食品系统”

translation.en: But there seems to have been this endless cycle
translation.zh: 但我们看见的却是一场似乎永无止境的循环

translation.en: of failure and outbreaks and recalls and illnesses and deaths.
translation.zh: 监管失败、疫情爆发产品召回、染病死亡

translation.en: You know, when I hear politicians say,
translation.zh: 每当听到有政客说

translation.en: "We've got the safest food system in the world,"
translation.zh: 我们拥有全世界最安全的食品系统

translation.en: it's just… it's laughable. We don't have the safest food system in the world.
translation.zh: 我都觉得可笑我们的食品系统不是最安全的

translation.en: I mean, these pathogens are controllable. We're not controlling them.
translation.zh: 这些病原体的传播是可以控制的但我们没有那么做

translation.en: We're in the United States. We expect better.
translation.zh: 我们是美国 我们应该做得更好

translation.en: And when the safety of our food supply lets us down, it lets us down big-time.
translation.zh: 一旦食品供应的安全性令人失望那便是大失所望

translation.en: [Brian] Right now, the government is not doing enough to protect consumers.
translation.zh: 目前政府对消费者的保护程度还不够

translation.en: And then consumers, because the burden is often on them when it gets to that level,
translation.zh: 因而这个担子就落到了消费者身上

translation.en: you know, they have to make sure that they're taking the proper steps at home.
translation.zh: 他们必须确保在家对食物进行了适当的处理

translation.en: I would say number one food on my list that I avoid is cantaloupe.
translation.zh: 要说我会避免的食物清单排第一的就是哈密瓜

translation.en: You cannot properly clean the outside,
translation.zh: 你不可能把它的表面清洗干净

translation.en: and once you bring that knife through it, it's too late.
translation.zh: 而刀一旦切下去 一切就太迟了

translation.en: And there's no kill step for cantaloupe.
translation.zh: 而且哈密瓜都是切开即吃的

translation.en: Number two is sprouts.
translation.zh: 第二个是豆芽

translation.en: Every other year, there's a significant outbreak
translation.zh: 每隔一年就会爆发一次严重的疫情

translation.en: where there's just no way to clean them.
translation.zh: 而我们根本没法把它们彻底洗净

translation.en: I would say number three would be bagged lettuce.
translation.zh: 排名第三的应该是袋装生菜

translation.en: Your spring mix. Your different salad mixes.
translation.zh: 春季混合沙拉菜 各种不同的沙拉菜组合

translation.en: You don't necessarily know how many heads of lettuce that came from.
translation.zh: 你根本不知道那一个包装袋里有多少颗不同生菜的叶片

translation.en: Or do you even know if it came from any one place?
translation.zh: 甚至不知道那些菜是不是来自同一个地方

translation.en: [Bill] All the outbreaks that I've been involved in
translation.zh: 我参与过的所有跟绿叶蔬菜疫情相关的官司

translation.en: are triple-washed, bagged, and shipped around the country.
translation.zh: 涉及的都是经过三重清洗然后打包运往全国各地的沙拉菜

translation.en: You know, buy it in a whole head and wash it yourself.
translation.zh: 直接买一颗生菜回去自己洗吧

translation.en: Control your own environment.
translation.zh: 掌控你自己的饮食环境

translation.en: [Sarah] Today, when we were ordering lunch,
translation.zh: 如今我们出外吃午餐时

translation.en: I avoided everything that has that little star on it on the menu
translation.zh: 我都会避免点那些带星号的菜式

translation.en: saying consumption of undercooked meat can expose you to risk.
translation.zh: 菜单上明确说明了其中含有半熟肉类 食用有风险

translation.en: So there was some raw fish they were serving,
translation.zh: 所以如果餐馆有供应生鱼片

translation.en: and I, uh, took a pass on that one.
translation.zh: 我是不会点来吃的

translation.en: [Timothy] You need to decide, "Am I a person who loves raw oysters enough
translation.zh: 这需要每个人自己去抉择我爱生吃牡蛎

translation.en: that I want to take the risks that are associated with raw oysters?"
translation.zh: 但有爱到宁愿承担随之而来的风险吗？

translation.en: [Sarah] I don't wanna be one of those people who ends up losing a limb
translation.zh: 我可不想因为出去吃了一顿晚饭

translation.en: because of, uh, you know, a night out.
translation.zh: 就得承担截肢的后果

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 非常感谢

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What are you having?
translation.zh: 你想要点什么？

translation.en: I'm gonna have a hamburger cooked to 155 degrees internal temperature,
translation.zh: 我想点一份汉堡汉堡肉的内部温度必须达到68摄氏度

translation.en: uh, french fries,
translation.zh: 再来点薯条

translation.en: and that's it.
translation.zh: 可以了

translation.en: [server] Okay. You got it.
translation.zh: 好的 明白

translation.en: [Ben] When you go to a restaurant and you want to order a hamburger,
translation.zh: 当你想去餐馆吃汉堡时

translation.en: the best thing to do is order to temperature,
translation.zh: 最好在点餐时明确要求汉堡肉的加热温度

translation.en: because medium rare, rare, well-done, those are all subjective.
translation.zh: 因为三分熟、一分熟、全熟这些都是很主观的概念

translation.en: You can't look at color or whether juices run clear.
translation.zh: 你不能靠看肉的颜色或者肉汁是否清澈来判断

translation.en: And if they say, "We don't have a thermometer. We can't cook to that."
translation.zh: 如果餐馆的人说“我们没有温度计 没办法测试温度”

translation.en: Then I'd order something else.
translation.zh: 那我建议你点别的食物

translation.en: I think when I first started doing this kind of work,
translation.zh: 刚开始从事这类工作的时候

translation.en: I kind of thought that,
translation.zh: 我还以为

translation.en: you know, if you sued enough people and you took enough money,
translation.zh: 只要你控告了足够多的人罚了他们足够多的钱

translation.en: that that would change their behavior.
translation.zh: 就能改变他们的行为

translation.en: I just turned 64, you know,
translation.zh: 我刚满64岁了

translation.en: and I just don't feel like I've accomplished what I was hoping to do.
translation.zh: 但我觉得我仍未达成自己想要的目标

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: 'Cause I really did think, you know… I really did think that, you know,
translation.zh: 因为我曾经以为 以前我真的相信

translation.en: by the time I got to this stage that,
translation.zh: 等我努力到了这个阶段

translation.en: um, you know, this kind of thing wouldn't be happening anymore.
translation.zh: 这种事情肯定已经被杜绝了

translation.en: But it happens
translation.zh: 然而这种事

translation.en: all the time.
translation.zh: 一直在发生

translation.en: ♪ Buried, banging at your door ♪
translation.zh: （在收到马勒的情愿后） （美国农业部决定禁止部分鸡肉产品含沙门氏菌）

translation.en: ♪ Don't hear a sound… ♪
translation.zh: （大部分含沙门氏菌的鸡肉产品仍然能在美国合法售卖）

translation.en: After my son died, I assumed that either the government,
translation.zh: 在我儿子去世后 我以为政府、法律和政策制定者或者科学技术领域的人

translation.en: you know, laws and policies,
translation.zh: 我以为政府、法律和政策制定者或者科学技术领域的人

translation.en: or science and technology would take care of this.
translation.zh: 总有一方会出面解决这个问题

translation.en: We wouldn't be dealing with food safety like we're talking about in 1993.
translation.zh: 我们对待食品安全问题的态度不会跟1993年时一样

translation.en: ♪ A rising steam… ♪
translation.zh: （戴维勒教授仍专注于） （向未来的行业领袖们传授食品安全知识）

translation.en: Regulators have the ability to set the tone and to build a framework
translation.zh: 监管者有能力营造一个适当的环境 建立一个合理的体系来鼓励食品行业者做正确的事

translation.en: that encourages industry to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 建立一个合理的体系来鼓励食品行业者做正确的事

translation.en: ♪ On the devil's tree ♪ ♪ I clutched a branch… ♪
translation.zh: （莎拉索彻正推动一项法案使美国农业部对农场有更多管辖权）

translation.en: If the public makes their voices heard
translation.zh: 如果公众的声音能被听见

translation.en: and puts pressure on their legislators,
translation.zh: 让舆论给立法者施压

translation.en: let them know that this is not acceptable,
translation.zh: 让他们知道目前的状况是难以容忍的

translation.en: then I believe, yes, legislators will act on their behalf.
translation.zh: 那么我相信是的 立法者一定会采取行动

translation.en: ♪ I walk alone ♪ ♪ Beside myself… ♪
translation.zh: （罗莎迪劳洛仍是国会中的食品安全斗士）

translation.en: I think you just have to keep fighting the battles that are in front of you,
translation.zh: 我认为人就是得坚持不懈地继续眼前的战斗

translation.en: and I still think there are things more to do, um, so I guess I got to get busy.
translation.zh: 我认为还有很多事需要我去做所以我不能停下脚步
